issue_obverse_figure_description_s: Seal of sun and sundial with mottoes FUGIO (I fly) and MIND YOUR BUSINESS.
issue_obverse_legend_s: ONE THIRD OF A DOLLAR, According to a RESO-LUTION OF CONGRESS, passed at Philadelphia February 17, 1776.
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: Chain with thirteen links, each representing one of the original colonies, and each depicting a colony's name. Sun in the center of the chain with the motto WE ARE ONE | AMERICAN CONGRESS.
issue_reverse_legend_s: One Third of a DOLLAR. | Printed by Hall & Sellers, in Philadelphia. 1776.
